eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E extends Distribution>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E extends Distribution>
extends ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class ConditionalDistribution. It defines the conditional distribution of a variable with a base distribution given a set of Multinomial parents.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#bnmodifyexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
